alert.note: Alert for Beauregard; Calcasieu (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Lake Charles (Southeast Texas and Southwest Louisiana)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 23 at 8:00PM CDT until further notice by NWS Lake Charles
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Louisiana...Texas... Sabine River Near Deweyville ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Louisiana... Calcasieu River NEAR White Oak Park Calcasieu River Near Oberlin Calcasieu River Near Glenmora Calcasieu River Near Oakdale Additional information is available at www.weather.gov. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM THURSDAY AFTERNOON UNTIL FURTHER NOTICE... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Sabine River Near Deweyville. * WHEN...From Thursday afternoon until further notice. * IMPACTS...At 25.0 feet, Lowest roads beside the river flood around Deweyville and subject to being closed. In addition, low-lying roads in Southwest Beauregard Parish are flooded including Robert Clark Road. Flooding occurs on the south side of Niblett Bluff Park with access roads to camp houses cut off around the park. Access roads to the river in Northeastern Orange County become flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 6:45 PM CDT Wednesday the stage was 23.1 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon and continue rising to a crest of 24.9 feet early Sunday morning. - Flood stage is 24.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Thu Fri Sat Sabine River Deweyville 24.0 23.1 Wed 6 pm CDT 24.1 24.6 24.8 &&
